characterDescription:
Sheler was a commander in Amaram's army.
He was captured by the Herdazian general, Dieno enne Calah, who offered Sheler his choice of the way of execution, and Sheler chose a battle with a hog. The soldier chained him on the shore and poured grease on him. The soldier then explained that it was a kind of amusement for the Mink, and he himself had been chained down there and got out. The last thing Sheler saw was  an enormous claw breaking the surface of the ocean.
